definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The bus and the van collided.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车与客货车相撞。

sentences.english: He points over to the guard room as a carpet installation truck pulls up.
sentences.chinese: 他指向警卫室，一辆地毯铺装公司的货车开到了。

sentences.english: Every day, 30 lorries and containers will be made overseas Anping wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 每天有30辆货车及集装箱将安平丝网发往外地。

sentences.english: The broken-down car was taken in tow by a lorry.
sentences.chinese: 那辆坏了的车由一辆货车拖着。

sentences.english: The mobile grocery carts travel through the lanes.
An underrun protection device installed at the bottom rear-end of truck is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种装于货车后下部的防钻撞保护装置。

sentences.english: She reached down, picked up a suitcase, and put it back in the van.
sentences.chinese: 她弯下腰，拎起一个手提箱放回货车里。

sentences.english: Do you have a pickup truck you could use to haul furniture?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有小辆小货车来运输家具？

sentences.english: Yesterday a truck full of injured people arrived.
sentences.chinese: 昨天就有一辆货车拉来一车伤者。

sentences.english: The road was blocked by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 道路被一辆货车堵塞了。

sentences.english: A tractor pulls plows or wagons.
I have to load it in the smaller vans and then carry them to the bigger ones parked at the back.
sentences.chinese: 一辆红色的货车往西开，后面还有几辆小汽车和货车。

sentences.english: I have to load it in the smaller vans and then carry them to the bigger ones parked at the back.
sentences.chinese: 一辆红色的货车往西开，后面还有几辆小汽车和货车。

sentences.english: A little stone may upset a large cart.
sentences.chinese: 一个小石头可能阻碍一辆大与运货车。

sentences.english: A truck carrying hundreds of beehives overturned.
sentences.chinese: 一辆装有数百个蜂箱的大货车倾覆。

sentences.english: We saw several of the van drivers in their blue and yellow livery .
sentences.chinese: 我们看见数个穿著蓝黄制服的货车司机。

definition: small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
